summary: An ordinance providing for improvement of 47th Avenue South, from Thistle Street to Cloverdale Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10742 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
